i18n.key: The label used in backoffice to identify the filter.
End of validity date for the filter. After this date, the filter will no longer be active.
Shipping method linked to the filter. When the filter can be applied, it will be used as the corresponding fees for this shipping method for the current order.
Application conditions of the shipping filter, evaluated at the second step of the standard ordering process.
Determines whether the filter should be applied to the shipping method when this mode comes from the "Special transporter" field of one of the products of the order.
filter validity start date. Before this date, the filter is not active.
The VAT code used for converting between incl. or excl. taxes, as well as for calculating VAT amounts in orders.
Shipping fees incl. taxes for the order when the filter can be applied and the visitor chooses said shipping method.
